title: BRIEF-Cerillion Says Won £2.9m New Contract In South Africa
text:
BRIEF-Cerillion Says Won £2.9m New Contract In South Africa

Stock Markets 19 minutes ago (Oct 14, 2019 08:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Cerillion Says Won £2.9m New Contract In South Africa Oct 14 (Reuters) - Cerillion PLC : * MAJOR CONTRACT WIN * MAJOR CONTRACT WIN * IT HAS WON A NEW CONTRACT WORTH £2.9M WITH A MOBILE VIRTUAL NETWORK ENABLER (MVNE) IN SOUTH AFRICA * CONTRACT SUPPORTS CERILLION'S EXISTING MARKET FORECASTS FOR NEW FINANCIAL YEAR

BRIEF-Cerillion Says Won £2.9m New Contract In South Africa
